spec_data.Name: perl-VM-EC2
spec_data.Description:
This is an interface to the 2013-07-15 version of the Amazon AWS API
<http://aws.amazon.com/ec2>. This library will also support the Eucalyptus
open source cloud <http://open.eucalyptus.com>.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 06:10:01 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Control the Amazon EC2 and Eucalyptus Clouds
